{CovLStrv2{{t{Passing freed pointer {0} as an argument to {1}.}{{code{vmtxTab}}}{{code{dumpString}}}}}}

typePropertiesGroup.localEffect: This could cause an immediate crash or incorrect values might be read subsequently resulting in incorrect computations.
typePropertiesGroup.longDescription: A pointer to freed memory is dereferenced, used as a function argument, or otherwise used
